H0.text: A sunflower grows toward the Sun is a description of an organism's development.

H1.text: A Venus's-flytrap plant closing its leaves around a fly is a description of an organism's development.

H2.text: An egg hatching, growing into a tadpole, and then into a frog is a description of an organism's development.

H3.text: A lizard loses its tail and grows a new one is a description of an organism's development.

A4.text: Frogs hatch from the eggs as larvae with external gills.
